casebody.data:
EPIC SYSTEMS CORPORATION, petitioner,
v.
Jacob LEWIS. No. 16-285. Supreme Court of the United States Jan. 25, 2017. The following briefing schedule is adopted: Petitioner in Nos. 16-285 and 16-300 and respondent in No. 16-307 will file opening and reply briefs under the schedule set forth in Rules 25.1 and 25.3. Respondent in Nos. 16-285 and 16-300 and petitioner in No. 16-307 will file response briefs under the schedule set forth in Rule 25.2.
